channel.title: 562 help please 562
channel.description:
[center]NEED HELP SO DESPERATE[/center]
Guyz i really need help on this problem. for some reason when someone dies in my server they keep losing items, but i dont want that to happen i want the person to keep all his items when he dies. can someone please HELP ME if someone does help me ill make them admin on my server or anything... So people please help im desperate
